Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 2

Contact us:

Managers: Steve Adams and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 263838

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time

2B Norton Village Hall 0940 – 1000

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesday:

2016: 13 January, 10 February, 9 March, 6 April, 4 May, 1 June, 29 June, 27 July, 24 August, 21 September, 19 October, 16 November, 14 December
